item.description: The agenda: Towards a Cyber Defense Framework for SCADA Systems Based on Power Consumption Monitoring Situational Awareness for security adaptation in Industrial Control Systems A Multi-Classifier Network-Based Crypto Ransomware Detection System: A Case Study of Locky Ransomware
